title: Tassel, 19th century
medium: Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core, linen
description: Turned wooden mould (ball over vase over truncated cylinder). Upper members painted gold and covered with trellis of gold thread. Skirt (over cylinder) of white silk covered with gold threads and ornamental strings of spirals and rosettes.

tombstone.epitaph: Tassel, 19th century.Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core, linen. 1908-2-2.
